summary:
- **Buy-back Type**: On-market  
- **Total Buy-back Program Size**: Up to $400 million AUD  
- **Buy-back Period**: 28/3/2025 to 27/3/2026  
- **Shares Bought Back to Date**: 6,286,322 (before 23/6/2025) + 130,314 (on 23/6/2025)  
- **Total Consideration Paid**: AUD 116.5M (cumulative) + AUD 2.47M (previous day)  
- **Price Range**: AUD 16.95 (low) to AUD 19.32 (high)  
- **Broker**: Goldman Sachs Australia Pty Ltd  
- **Key Condition**: No minimum/maximum shares guaranteed; program subject to market conditions and may be varied/suspended.  

*Omit routine daily updates unless cumulative data signals material progress vs. program cap.*
